member.summary: Target delegate must compatible with delegate Func(Of T, String, Boolean), the first parameter in the delegate is the data type and the data to write to the file, the second parameter is the file path of the IO operation and the last bool return value indicated that the io operation success or not. please notices that, for the considerations of the data type compatible, the collection data type is recommended implement as generic enumeration interface.
